definition: to move/to shift/to change (a position or location etc)/to promote

sentences.english: Each Ojibwa tribe was divided into migratory bands.
sentences.chinese: 奥吉布瓦人各部落都分为若干迁徙性家族。

sentences.english: Transnationalism designates a recent shift in migration bird patterns.
sentences.chinese: 跨国主义者指出了一个最近发生迁徙鸟类上的转变。

sentences.english: The Dickey County project is outside the cranes' normal migratory flight path.
sentences.chinese: 美洲鹤正常迁徙飞行线路没有经过迪基县的项目。

sentences.english: This provide a important data for the study of birds band.
sentences.chinese: 为我国鸟类环志迁徙研究提供了重要数据。

sentences.english: Birds will fatten themselves with heavy feeding in advance of a long migrational flight.
sentences.chinese: 在长途迁徙飞行开始前，鸟儿会吃大量的食物增肥。

sentences.english: It's the wild geese's instinct to migrate to warm places every autumn.
sentences.chinese: 迁徙到温暖的地方，是大雁的常性。

sentences.english: Spring in northern Canada means the migration of three million caribou across the arctic tundra.
sentences.chinese: 春天的到来带来了加拿大北部三百万头驯鹿的大迁徙。

sentences.english: But there were some problems, and the Church kept moving west.
sentences.chinese: 但是发生了一些问题，教会不断往西部迁徙。

sentences.english: Humpback whales hold the world's record for longest mammalian voyage.
sentences.chinese: 座头鲸保持著世界上哺乳动物中迁徙距离最长的记录。

sentences.english: Imagine the migration of blue dragons. That would be really cool.
sentences.chinese: 想像一群蓝龙迁徙的情景，一定令人难忘。

sentences.english: It foundered during the turmoils accompanying the Great Migrations.
sentences.chinese: 它在随着民族大迁徙而出现的混乱中崩溃。

sentences.english: They are sexually mature at this age and begin to participate in the breeding migrations.
sentences.chinese: 在这个时候它们性征发育成熟并开始参与繁殖大迁徙。

sentences.english: The major researchful results are following:1. The structure of avian community and migration dynamic of main groups.
sentences.chinese: 唐海湿地鸟类群落结构特征及主要类群的迁徙动态。

sentences.english: As more species migrate, new quandaries are likely to arise.
sentences.chinese: 随着更多的物种迁徙，新的窘境还会出现。

sentences.english: Every year, in spring and fall, over 300 bird species migrate through Dubai.
sentences.chinese: 每年的春天和秋天，超过300种鸟类迁徙路过迪拜。

definition: to multiply/to reproduce/to increase gradually in number or quantity
to inhabit a region (esp. ethnic group)/to congregate
nomadic/to move about in search of pasture/to rove around as a nomad
to move (from one residence to another)
to settle (in some city, country etc)/to take up residence
(lit.) leftover men/(fig.) loyalist adherents of a former dynasty/surviving members of an ethnic group
to run away from trouble/to flee from calamity/to be a refugee
